actions.name: actions
actions.description: This is the root of the action space

actions/swarm.name: swarm
actions/swarm.description:
This folder contains all actions pertaining to internal swarm operations such as:
- saving data to swarm memory
- retrieving data from swarm memory

actions/data.name: data
actions/data.description: This folder contains all actions pertaining to data operations on any cloud provider or local machines

actions/data/file_operations.description: This folder contains all actions pertaining to file operations on any cloud provider or local machines

actions/data/file_operations/file_retrie.name: mac_file_retrieval.py
actions/data/file_operations/file_retrie.description: This action retrieves a file from a mac

file_path.description: The path to the file to be retrieved

actions/data/file_operations/file_upload.name: mac_file_upload.py
actions/data/file_operations/file_upload.description: This action uploads a file to a mac

file_path.description: The path to the file to be uploaded

actions/data/file_operations/file_deleti.name: mac_file_deletion.py
actions/data/file_operations/file_deleti.description: This action deletes a file from a mac

file_path.description: The path to the file to be deleted

actions/data/file_operations/rename_file.name: mac_rename_file.py
actions/data/file_operations/rename_file.description: This action renames a file on a mac

file_path.description: The path to the file to be renamed

new_file_name.description: The new name of the file

actions/data/file_operations/move_file/m.name: mac_move_file.py
actions/data/file_operations/move_file/m.description: This action moves a file on a mac

file_path.description: The path to the file to be moved

new_file_path.description: The new path of the file

actions/data/folder_operations/make_fold.name: mac_make_folder.py
actions/data/folder_operations/make_fold.description: This action makes a folder on a mac

folder_path.description: The path to the folder to be made

actions/data/folder_operations/delete_fo.name: mac_delete_folder.py
actions/data/folder_operations/delete_fo.description: This action deletes a folder on a mac

folder_path.description: The path to the folder to be deleted

actions/data/folder_operations/rename_fo.name: mac_rename_folder.py
actions/data/folder_operations/rename_fo.description: This action renames a folder on a mac

folder_path.description: The path to the folder to be moved

new_folder_path.description: The new path of the folder

actions/data/folder_operations/move_fold.name: mac_move_folder.py
actions/data/folder_operations/move_fold.description: This action moves a folder on a mac

folder_path.description: The path to the folder to be moved

new_folder_path.description: The new path of the folder

actions/data/folder_operations/list_fold.name: mac_list_folder.py
actions/data/folder_operations/list_fold.description: This action lists the contents of a folder on a mac

folder_path.description: The path to the folder to be listed

error_message.description: Error message if status_message is Failure
